Hi,

I'm Hassan Naeem.

About Me

  • 2015

    Gained interest in web development while participating in a couple of idea-based competitions during freshman year of college.

  • 2015

    Attended the Flatiron School's Web Development Fellowship, where I learned Ruby, Rails, HTML/CSS, and JavaScript.

  • 2016

    Interned at Risk Management Solutions, where I worked on a client-based website using Angular JS.

  • 2016-2017

    Worked on a couple of solo projects to gain a better understanding of front-end development and Angular. Additionally, I freelanced and developed Acctwell's website.

  • 2017

    Interned at Ralph Interactive, where I used React & Redux to help develop Mr. Robot's San Diego Comic Con web experience.

  • 2017-Present

    Currently working as a Software Engineer on the growth team at Tictail.
